library(dplyr)

# Keep Sex with only Male and Female
data_raw_target <- data_raw_target %>%
  filter(q2 %in% c(1, 2)) %>%
  mutate(
    q2 = case_when(
      q2 == 1 ~ "Male",
      q2 == 2 ~ "Female",
      TRUE ~ "No response/Other" 
    )
  )
